Name: [Affinity] Un-Bear-Able Rage
Desc: In specific areas of Hollow Zero, there's a chance to trigger special events for agents in the squad, activating specific Mindscapes for the Agent for the current round.
Desc2: Ben quotes an "angry price," an amount most ordinary people couldn't even dream of affording. Luckily, some unsavory characters down in the Hollows are going to cover the bill.
